title: SplitSharp
description: Easy split strings with escape characters or quoted values

packOptions.summary:
The missing options for String.Split! Split a string with an escape character or escape values with quotes.

  Features: 
 - Highly customizable 
 - No regexes used 
 - Lazy evaluation. Supported platforms: .NET 1.0-4.6, .NET Core, NetStandard 1.0
